Statute.Title: Northern Transportation Company Limited Disposal Authorization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Société des transports du nord Limitée, Loi autorisant l’aliénation de La)

General.Text: Consequential, s. 10 (see R.S., c. 39 (1st Supp.), s. 1)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1985, c. 35, ss. 1, 2, 3(1) and (3), and 6 in force on assent 28.06.85; s. 7 proclaimed in force 14.07.85, ss. 3(2), 3(4) and ss. 8 to 10 proclaimed in force 15.07.85 see SI/85‑141
CIF, 1988, c. 38, s. 101 proclaimed in force 15.09.88 see SI/88‑197
